name: <gradient=#bfeaff, #0aadff>Universal Crossplay</gradient>
description:
A shared world for Java and Bedrock — with cracked support so everyone can join.

Bedrock connects on port 19132.

name: <gradient=#ffc9b3, #ff6929, #ff5d17>Core Elements</gradient>
description: Unlock crates, claim your land, take on quests, and earn ranks, kits, and rewards. Every step shapes your SMP journey.

name: <gradient=#C3FAC9, #00F518>Economy</gradient>
description: LɄnits (Lunar Units) fuel the economy — buy from Chest Shops, trade in the Auction House, and purchase ranks, crate keys, and more from the LɄnit Market. Build your wealth and influence.

name: <gradient=#ff8080, #ff2b2b, #ff0808>PvP Arenas</gradient>
description: Enter PvP Arenas where keep inventory is off and battles are high-stakes. PvP auto-activates on entry, locking you in until the fight ends — from tense 1v1 duels to chaotic 16-player clashes.
